trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies scope of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*> as a page, document, or sequence of documents.
trans-unit.target: 指定之範圍的列舉值<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>網頁、 文件，或文件的順序。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>

trans-unit.source: Based on the scope of defined by `printTicketLevel`, the number of pages or the number of documents associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.
trans-unit.target: 根據的範圍所定義`printTicketLevel`，網頁或<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>相關聯的文件數目的數目

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default printer settings to use when the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定預設列印文件時所要使用的印表機設定。

trans-unit.source: Setting the CurrentPrintTicket property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 設定 CurrentPrintTicket 屬性不會驗證或修改指定<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a given printer.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>這是適用於給定的印表機。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default printer settings to use when the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: 在列印文件時所要使用預設印表機設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the scope of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出的範圍<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the CurrentPrintTicketLevel property is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of documents output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: CurrentPrintTicketLevel 屬性時<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A>屬性會指定與<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>文件輸出的數目</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A></xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>

trans-unit.source: For other CurrentPrintTicketLevel values, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需其他 CurrentPrintTicketLevel 值，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A>屬性會指定與<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>頁面輸出的數目</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumeration that indicates the scope of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"></xref> event as for a sequence of documents, a single document, or a single page.
trans-unit.target: 列舉，指出範圍<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"></xref>事件和文件、 單一文件或在單一頁面的順序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of documents or pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.
trans-unit.target: 取得具有<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>文件或頁面輸出的數目

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>, the Sequence property specifies the number of documents output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>，順序屬性指定的數目與<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>文件輸出</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel></xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> values, the Sequence property specifies the number of pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 為其他<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>值，順序屬性指定<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>輸出頁數</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of documents or pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.
